channel.title: Please help, screwed up server and no backup!
channel.description: Last thing i did was add a model into my client and in class8.java Then i went to npc.cfg and changed it's id and stuff and then when i started server i got this: [CODE]EmpireScape is online. Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ClassFormatError: Truncated class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:186) at server.run(server.java:323) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/CODE] I even replaced whole config folder with the backup one, but the backup i have is like a week old cause i forgot to make backups :D and so now ... I'm screwed :( :( :(

item.title: Please help, screwed up server and no backup!
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Yes, i did and there were tabs.
And btw i replaced old NPCHandler.java with the one from the backup and somehow it got fixed but i never edited NPCHandler.java :S

Read full topic
item.source: Please help, screwed up server and no backup!

item.title: Please help, screwed up server and no backup!
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

[quote=“Pray for plagues, post:3, topic:273818”]When you added the npc to the .cfg did you use spaces or tabs? If you used spaces that’s why.[/quote] Make sure you used tabs as he said.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help, screwed up server and no backup!
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Last thing i did was add a model into my client and in class8.java
Then i went to npc.cfg and changed it’s id and stuff and then when i started server i got this:

EmpireScape is online. Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ClassFormatError: Truncated class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:186) at server.run(server.java:323) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
I even replaced whole config folder with the backup one, but the backup i have is like a week old cause i forgot to make backups and so now …
I’m screwed
